26#include <sys/cdefs.h>
27__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_core_memory.c,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:30 riastradh Exp $");
28
29#include <core/memory.h>
30#include <subdev/instmem.h>
31
32void
33nvkm_memory_ctor(const struct nvkm_memory_func *func,
34 struct nvkm_memory *memory)
35{
36 memory->func = func;
37}
38
39void
40nvkm_memory_del(struct nvkm_memory **pmemory)
41{
42 struct nvkm_memory *memory = *pmemory;
43 if (memory && !WARN_ON(!memory->func)) {
44 if (memory->func->dtor)
45 *pmemory = memory->func->dtor(memory);
46 kfree(*pmemory);
47 *pmemory = NULL;
48 }
49}
50
51int
52nvkm_memory_new(struct nvkm_device *device, enum nvkm_memory_target target,
53 u64 size, u32 align, bool zero,
54 struct nvkm_memory **pmemory)
55{
56 struct nvkm_instmem *imem = device->imem;
57 struct nvkm_memory *memory;
58 int ret = -ENOSYS;
59
60 if (unlikely(target != NVKM_MEM_TARGET_INST || !imem))
61 return -ENOSYS;
62
63 ret = nvkm_instobj_new(imem, size, align, zero, &memory);
64 if (ret)
65 return ret;
66
67 *pmemory = memory;
68 return 0;
69}
70
